snippet.title: Sacrifice (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
This is the official release trailer for Sacrifice, a unique real time strategy game from 2000 developed by Texas-based Shiny Entertainment.

In Sacrifice you take the role of a wizard who enters a realm ruled by five different gods. You choose whom you wish to serve and receive a corresponding choice of spells and creatures - during the very dynamic campaign there is several occasions to change sides. The greatest specialty of Sacrifice is the fact that unlike in other rts games, here you directly control one character on the battlefield that is able to lead up to hundreds of incredibly weird creatures into battle and support them with powerful spells. Despite offering revolutionary gameplay and fantastic graphics the game unfortunately wasn't a commercial success.
